items.item: correct doctype element
html and head elements
author meta tag
page contains a form
There are input text areas for the following: account name, display name, email address, phone number, date of birth, zipcode, password, password confirmation
password and password confirmation should be password type
hidden field contains the current timestamp in millis then the form is submitted
clear button to empty fields
submit button executes JavaScript validation function before submitting form
each field is validated for correctness: account name
each field is validated for correctness: email address
each field is validated for correctness: phone number
each field is validated for correctness: date of birth
each field is validated for correctness: zipcode
each field is validated for correctness: password and password confirmation match
helpful alert to user of invalid form contents
submit button makes GET request to form processor page if form is valid
correct doctype element
html and head elements
author meta tag
extract query parameter from location and display key-value pairs in a two-column table
hidden timestamp is rendered as human readable datetime
Code is properly formatted (indentation, spacing)
function and variable names are descriptive
attribute values are quoted
appropriate use of whitespace
code is not complex
code 'smells' right
